goals__remit:
Training, participation in the EC programmes i.e.Erasmus for Students, Erasmus for Young Entrepreneurs, coaching and organizing the training courses about the European legislative process,EU Institutions and Brussels environment. Working as the member of the transnational teams in the field of Transport, Regions and Education. Main core of activities in the Social field to support through the knowledge the availability people for the labour market. I cooperate with the EC DGs and support EU policies, organize seminars and conferences, workshops. On these events the MEPs and EU Institutions Representatives participate as well as the highlevel speakers. On the other side I also cooperate with the Czech Republic Ambassadors, Regional representatives and the other Educational agencies (VET Providers) in the similar topics as I do to be mentioned above. 
In addition I am cooperate with the EC as the Expert Evaluator.(Transport, Regions, Education) 
Training courses organisation in Brussels focused the European legislative proces.
